item.content:encoded:
YouTube Outage In 2018

YouTube is top social media for videos in worldwide it’s running successfully with lakhs of subscriber and channel. In these YouTube, YouTube TV, and YouTube music down around one hour then it’s back on Wednesday (16/10/2018). As per web development company in Bangalore, we discuss what happened YouTube around one hour and how it was rectified.

what happened YouTube

A lot of users has reported regards getting “500 internal server error” on him/her display. In this global outrage was happened across the world and user was reported continuously from across the world because unable to access or upload content on YouTube. YouTube was felt a major outage in that history. Users across the world began to notice that the video service’s sites and mobile application were down around 9:20 PM ET, and everything continues inaccessible more than an hour later. YouTube TV and YouTube Music are also affected by the service interruption.

YouTube team had rectified the issue:

After getting a lot of reports from users, YouTube has confirmed the global outage in a tweet. “We’re working on resolving this and will let you know once fixed,” besides the Team YouTube account says. “We apologize for any inconvenience this may cause and will keep you updated.” Since of 10.35PM ET, the account is still responding to reports of the global outage saying that the team is working on the problem.

YouTube’s technical team was working to find the issue of down on YouTube. Finally, the team was found an issue that is the server and YouTube team has rectified the server issue. YouTube’s global outage was lasting around one hour. Finally, YouTube asked sorry to all users through Twitter. Now YouTube is running successfully all over the world.

 

The post YouTube Outage In 2018 appeared first on CairoCorps Consulting.
